itunes:title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 1
title: The Amazing Power of Forgiveness - Part 1
description: What is real forgiveness? In this broadcast, Pastor Rick explains what it means to you that forgiveness is unconditional and that it isn’t minimizing the seriousness of the offense. The Bible says in Luke 23:34, “Father, forgive them, for they do not know what they are doing.”
